actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.
Reported to House from the Committee on the District of Columbia with amendment, H. Rept. 93-1202.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #414 (351-11).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the District of Columbia.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the District of Columbia with amendment, S. Rept. 93-1259.

official_title: An Act to reorganize public post-secondary education in the District of Columbia, establish a Board of Trustees, authorize and direct the Board of Trustees to consolidate the existing local institutions of public postsecondary education into a single Land-Grant University of the District of Columbia, direct the board of Trustees to administer the University of the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.
short_title: District of Columbia Public Higher Education Reorganization Act

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) District of Columbia Public Postsecondary Education Reorganization Act - =Title I: Short Title, Purposes, and Definitions= - States that it is the intent of Congress to authorize a public land-grant university through the reorganization of the existing local institutions of public post-secondary education in the District of Columbia. Defines the terms used in this Act. =Title II: Board of Trustees= - Authorizes the establishment of the University of the District of Columbia, which shall be an independent agency of the District of Columbia government governed by a Board of Trustees. Sets forth the membership composition and the duties of the Board of Trustees. Vests in the Trustees all functions, powers, and duties of the Board of Higher Education and the Vocational Board under the District of Columbia Public Education Act of 1966. =Title III: Authorizations= - Authorizes the appropriation out of any money in the Treasury to the credit of the District of Columbia such sums as may be necessary for carrying out the purpose of this Act. =Title IV: Miscellaneous= - Sets forth various administrative provisions including Board of Trustees' meeting times, appointment of advisory committees, and the management of appropriations.

titles.title: District of Columbia Public Higher Education Reorganization Act

A bill to reorganize public higher education in the District of Columbia, establish a board of trustees, authorize and direct the board of trustees to consolidate the existing local institutions of public higher education into a single Land-Grant University of the District of Columbia, direct the board of trustees to administer the University of the District of Columbia.

An Act to reorganize public post-secondary education in the District of Columbia, establish a Board of Trustees, authorize and direct the Board of Trustees to consolidate the existing local institutions of public postsecondary education into a single Land-Grant University of the District of Columbia, direct the board of Trustees to administer the University of the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.
